channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view

item.title: Version 1.108.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.31

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Dates label is now correct when used with utc formatter
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types

item.title: Version 1.108.28 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.28

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Status with icon and text overflows correctly now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: sorting grouped columns when autoExpandMode = "Sequential"
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add styling for disabled calendar items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.108.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.30

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Required label fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: enhance check for wrong values of filter fields

item.title: Version 1.120.13 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.13

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: Aligned with visual specification
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent user value override
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix permanent display
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: do not overwrite Unit's maxFractionDigits format option
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts

item.title: Version 1.120.17 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.17

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: icon is shown correctly now for theme horizon HCB and HCW. The status is now aligned correctly in sap.ui.table.Table.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Fix non-expanding Table

item.title: Version 1.120.18 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.18

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Custom image icon is displayed correctly now

item.title: Version 1.120.19 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.19

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: actionBarExpanded now works when there is only one action item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnMenu: Check for container instance when setting visibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins

item.title: Version 1.120.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.10

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ResourceBundle getText method properly used
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correction for deletion indicator

item.title: Version 1.120.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.11

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: Is truncated correctly in sap.m.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers

item.title: Version 1.120.12 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.12

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust resource bundle API calls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.120.16 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.16

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs

item.title: Version 1.121.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view

item.title: Version 1.121.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.2

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix permanent display
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange translation is correct now in Dutch
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts

item.title: Version 1.121.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.3

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: do not overwrite Unit's maxFractionDigits format option
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places

item.title: Version 1.121.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.5

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Fixed wrong icon names
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places

item.title: Version 1.122.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.122.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Adds option for hyphenation in header
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Enable support for UI5 Flexibility actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitch: Acc sample improved
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: always render 6 weeks
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: render disabled dates in Week & OneMonth views
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ColorPalette: add selected state
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Removed maximum width of the MenuButton
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: ValueHelp is shown when interacting with keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correction for deletion indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: adjust maxSuggestionWidth property documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabHeader: Close tab popover when the header area is clicked
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Visual tests ownership added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Image: Acc sample improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectMarker: focus visible in sap.ui.table.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: selectAll button alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: missing spaces in RadioButtonGroup
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: remove padding coming from the Dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The JS Date is being replaced with UI5Date
    • Type: FIX, Description: SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: Focusing on the first element when selecting an entire week
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Selection event is fired only once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Seleted item is scrolled into view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Panel: Header's padding adjusted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire startDateChange event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Wide initials fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Space press no longer scrolls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Space event prevention remove
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerSliders: are aligned correctly on tablet
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: The JS Date is being replaced with UI5Date
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Logic fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: revert icon change
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: amount scale is used instead of unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context#setSelected: remember to reset selection again
    • Type: FIX, Description: ui5loader: Prevent unrelated -dbg requests in partial debug mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.RecordReplay: Configuration initialization corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat#format: remove trailing decimal zeros
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat.format: fix rounding for positive scientific notation numbers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat.RoundingMode: improve JSDoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat#format: Fix rounding of "-.567"
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/ShortcutHelper: Ensure handling of KeyboardEvents only
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Change info fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: Scroll to module function corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Added action button to the Analytical card popover
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Adds option for hyphenation in header
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Fixed circular dependency in Card.request
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Improve card in dialog with defined width
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Remove scrollbar from snack layer when not needed
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: ColumnLayout: increase maximum columns for M and L
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: show all items button not reachable via keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: BT operator: no error if wrong input
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field, FilterField: Enter after arrow navigation
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core: Allow for async control event handlers
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: always render 6 weeks
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: render disabled dates in Week & OneMonth views
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.MenuItemBase: provide custom image support
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: New property added
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: New CSS class for background transparency
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.AnchorBar: Pressing Enter fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Unstable test corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSectionBase: Check for undefined
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Unstable test corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Logic fixed

item.title: Version 1.123.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.123.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Error message for invalid request configuration is now translated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix overlaping of snappedContent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Shellbar: FCL sample fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitchItem: Aria-checked attribute added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fix in focus handling for tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.cards.NumericHeader: Loading placeholder of subtitle and unit now covers content underneath
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Providing weekNumberPress and selectedDatesChange events
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Show 12h format if the display format contains the symbol B
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.8 and v4.20
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Breadcrumbs: currentLocation is link
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added MenuItem shortcutText property
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: implemented Custom Content in Appointments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Fix failing qunit tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ScrollPosition: Fix unstable test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Fix permanent display
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: prevent user value override
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Fixed paging indicator numbers in right-to-left (RTL) mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Test page adjustment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Button in Split mode has correct border and focus in horizon theme
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: hover and focus visual fixes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: the colors from the color property are already reflected in the monthly view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: fixed test accessibility page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RangeSlider: Test page fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider: fix horizon scale alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m,sap.ui.commons,sap.ui.core,sap.uxap: Deprecated API descriptions enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Button type change fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider: adjust sizings for all themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Displayed correctly in footer when button mode is "Split"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Link: Is truncated correctly in sap.m.Table
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.inputUtils.ListHelpers: Group items properly added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Remove empty attributes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.BreadCrumbs: Add 'tabindex' on the correct element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: Equalize width of single and multiple rows groups
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Acc sample improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Acc sample improved
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added MenuItem shortcutText property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed TNT chart illustrations
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.SideNavigation: Add proper bottom margin for all navigation list items
  • Library: sap.ui.commons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m,sap.ui.commons,sap.ui.core,sap.uxap: Deprecated API descriptions enhanced
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.core.IconPool: Update icon font v5.8 and v4.20
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/EventBus: add try/catch around calling the listeners
    • Type: FIX, Description: XMLTemplateProcessor: Keep sync. processing of stashed controls stable
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Currency: amount scale is used instead of currency's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataModel#setChangeGroups: Improve JSDoc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.Unit: do not overwrite Unit's maxFractionDigits format option
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m,sap.ui.commons,sap.ui.core,sap.uxap: Deprecated API descriptions enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: mvc/Controller: Replace function call with apply
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Visibility of version info on touch-based devices
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Prevent potential failure of simultaneous CSRF token re-fetch
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Error message for invalid request configuration is now translated
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed object card date range binding
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: Fixed circular dependency in Card.request
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.cards.NumericHeader: Loading placeholder of subtitle and unit now covers content underneath
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Array parameter in data request no longer ends with undefined values
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterField: enable token deletion via backspace
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: initializing currency updates value
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added MenuItem shortcutText property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: remove extra week number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Loading calendar types in advance
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Improved sectons handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m,sap.ui.commons,sap.ui.core,sap.uxap: Deprecated API descriptions enhanced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Layout issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: fixed title misalignment
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#getAuthorName] This property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#getAuthorPicture] This property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#getDatetime] this property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#setAuthorName] This property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#setAuthorPicture] This property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.NotificationListBase#setDatetime] this property is available directly on {@link sap.m.NotificationListItem}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.model.odata.v4.ODataContextBinding#execute] use {@link #invoke} instead

item.title: Version 1.124.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: FCL: Restore focus same column fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: New Assistant color added
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix wrongly sized mid column
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: For GenericTile, we've now updated the badge element name to Tileinfo, and also created a new enum TileInfoColor that adds color to the TileInfo element
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support snapToRow property that sets the height of the inner controls to 100%
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced the badge element that is used within the GenericTile control as a combination of an icon and a text
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.MessageBox: Add new dependentOn option
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Exception prevented in case of tabular suggestions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: The toolbar spacer is no longer hidden on phone
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Available items announcement improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent suggestions popover closing on Enter key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Prevent value DOM update when password type is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile: Remove the critical color on the text when the tile is in ActionMode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MaskInput: remove too descriptive label
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Badge is visible on tab with text and icon - inline mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Prevent infinite resize
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Title font-size fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Fix left aligment in Tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Slider: Accessibility samples adjusments
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is displayed correctly in Form
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image loading of Avatar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix footer buttons visibility when there is not enough space
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: fix popup rendering
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap-icons-tnt: Fixed wrong icon names
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Test Starter: Support ui5:// URLs for "page"
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: core/UIComponent: Provide internal hook for router class definition
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/util/Version: fix type signature of `compareTo` method
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/LabelEnablement: getIdForLabel only on sap.ui.core.Control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.type.Unit/Currency#formatValue: document precedence of maxFractionDigits,scale and decimal places
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Index tree item scrolling tweak
    • Type: FIX, Description: DemoKit: ScrollToElement in ApiiRef master-side corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Samples default theme fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Card with Auto data mode can be reached by keyboard
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration cards: Fixed pagination with microcharts
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.HorizontalLayout: adding an accessibility test page
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: FilterField: copy Tokens as key/description pairs
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: Reset via p13n/settings dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: name setters now work properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: update type info for uploadComplete event
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: ObjectPageLayout: Fix lazy loading of data of BlockBases
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [module:sap/ui/core/format/TimezoneUtil#undefined] use {@link module:sap/base/i18n/date/TimezoneUtils} instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nConditionPanel#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nFilterItem#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nFilterPanel.FilterConditionOperations#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nFilterPanel#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nItem#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nOperationsHelper#undefined] replaced by the artifacts provided in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.P13nPanel#undefined] replaced by the artifacts in {@link sap.m.p13n}.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable.ItemInfo#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.plugins.UploadSetwithTable.ItemInfo}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable.itemValidationHandler#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.plugins.UploadSetwithTable.itemValidationHandler}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTableItem#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.upload.UploadItem}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.m.upload.UploadSetwithTable#undefined] replaced by {@link sap.m.plugins.UploadSetwithTable}
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.filterbar.vh.CollectiveSearchSelect#undefined] Please use the <code>sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.CollectiveSearchSelect</code> control instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.filterbar.vh.FilterBar#undefined] Please use the <code>sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.FilterBar</code> control instead.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.table.Column#destroyCreationTemplate] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.table.Column#getCreationTemplate] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.table.Column#setCreationTemplate] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.Table#destroyCreationRow] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.Table#getCreationRow] the concept has been discarded.
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.mdc.Table#setCreationRow] the concept has been discarded.

item.title: Version 1.124.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.1

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/UIComponent: Fix access to routing config
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add sap-system to OData V4 service URLs
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadSetwithTable: Set correct path definition for sap.m.Link

item.title: Version 1.124.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.2

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering of the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: : sap.ui.rta: Show error dialog in case catalogsIds is returned empty from backend during catalog assignment for key user app variants.
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements (SFSF)
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view

item.title: Version 1.124.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.3

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Support aria-valuenow attribute
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added space between attributes and the action buttons in the ActionTile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated the event parameters for status and readystate
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the overlap issue in GenericTile when sap.m.TileSizeBehaviour.Small was being used.
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: rowmodes.Auto: Height calculation with margins
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.

item.title: Version 1.124.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.124.4

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: adjust more link tab order
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnLayout: keep breakpoint classes stable on invalidation

item.title: Version 1.125.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.125.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now introduced isTrustedSource property within sap.m.upload.UploadItem, specifically to preview the pdf type files
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Accessible Improvement for More Link
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Added "ariaLabelledBy" association
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: add additional detail to moreLinkPress event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: new noData aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Parameter type is passed correctly to ResourceBundle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Tokens creation on paste
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarView: update JSDocs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: add documentation for getters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Keyboard navigation is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.semantic.MessagesIndicator: Add default tooltip
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: The cellPress event is fired correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: remove unnecessary scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Back type button has correct hover colour
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Samples adjustment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: Step number is read out
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile: Handling the visbility of the more button inside the IconMode tile when inscribed inside the GridContainer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Addapted control after deprecated property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: center icon in month view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Displayed pages are preserved after invalidation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: adding an accessibility test page
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Aria-roledescription is removed
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Fixed non image comparison failure
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/UIComponent: Fix access to routing config
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.type.(Currency|Unit): use amount scale default 0 instead of currency's or unit's decimal places
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Icon: fix keyboard support for keys "Space" and "Enter"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap\ui\core\format\DateFormat.fnCreateDate: set UTCFullYear must be set with all components
    • Type: FIX, Description: Core: add documentation on the usage of the Core module
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Adjust index tree legal links separator position
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Card: dataTimestamp added to ariaLabbeledby
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.DynamicSideContent: fixed firing of the breakpointChanged event
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: UploadSetwithTable: Set correct path definition for sap.m.Link
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader : FileUploaderHelper is loaded from an absolute path
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: implement WCAG 2.2 compliance for focusable items
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Prevent errors
  • Library: deprecated
    • Type: DEPRECATED, Description: [sap.ui.table.Table#autoResizeColumn] replaced by {@link sap.ui.table.Column#autoResize}

item.title: Version 1.126.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Fixed lost focus item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Suppress invalidation of footer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.Card: Avoid double header focus visualization
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Added wrapping and wrapping type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: remove empty indicator when rendering icon
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Carousel: the page indicator can be placed over the content of the Carousel
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: missing title announcement for each row
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.LightBox: Error message is available for screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbarLayoutData: Typo fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering the input field when type password and clear icon are set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: added possibility to select a day with a ENTER
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Value state message link is now clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: Documentation: Parameter types are now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: redundant haspopup attribute removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: fire press onkeyup
    • Type: FIX, Description: ActionTile: New changes to align to the latest design
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarMonthGrid: enable mouse selection for More link
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButton: Text is not cut off by focus when text spacing is applied
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Fine tuned code control after deprecated property
    • Type: FIX, Description: Form: RadioButton - focus overlaps text
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Apply focus if page indicator arrow is pressed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: improve demo app sample reagarding accessibility
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: Fixed type in TNT library
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationList: Border styles now have correct values in all themes
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataTreeBindingFlat: the value for the magnitude is always converted to a number
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.util.LibraryInfo: Loosen baseUrl regex check
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.Context#requestSibling: fix request syntax
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.performance.XHRInterceptor: Fix CORS check
    • Type: FIX, Description: util/Mobile: update window size with delay after viewport is set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Demo Kit: Support line-through tags
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Improve Scrolling in Landscape Mode on Mobile Devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Fix API reference search result list item navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Version-info initialization corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: IndexEntry controller definition corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.integration.widget.Card: Add fitType property to icons in List and Table content
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Introduce displayZeroValue option for StackedBar micro chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: All elements of a List card item are read out
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: expander announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: mdc.FilterBar: improve focus handling of filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Expose public methods for preferred interaction type
    • Type: FIX, Description: MDCTable: The filter info bar must be labelled with its text
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: old unit used after Field was initialized
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: parsing nested brackets
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Key user app variant delete button is always disabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta: Prevent set focus on not existing key user app variant overview table
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: AnalyticalTable: Error when binding to named model
    • Type: FIX, Description: Tables: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Month/Year/Year Range pickers visual improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: is displayed correctly in RTL for two months view
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: add tooltips for calendar legend types
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: change event fire once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: adjust change event firing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: change cursor for header buttons
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: remove redundant required announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Currency: the currency is not truncating now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Title alignment
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Inconsistent header-collapsing corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: FormContainer: invalid role rendered in ColumnLayout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with selected SubSection

item.title: Version 1.126.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.126.1

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript

item.title: Version 1.127.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.127.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix table overlapping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Invalid resize prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Cleanup move listeners on destroy
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Syncronization issue corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Resize issue with iframe content fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header placement after expanded state change
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DatePicker, sap.m.DateTimePicker, sap.m.DateRangeSelection: add picker accessible name
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m Input: new 'fromKeyboard' parameter is now added to the valueHelpRequest event
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: add group type "Data" to value property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when all-day appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: add value state message to mobile numeric picker
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Prevent unnecessary scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SelectDialog,TableSelectDialog: Set focus to the initially focusable element after selection is reset
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: propagate row selection to table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've made the subheader dynamic in the NewsContent when it is in a stretch tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Provide additional testing control instance for the visual test
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Remove warning message when using sap.ui.core.HTML
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Change of library dependency to layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: Prevent appointment selection by pressing the Tab key
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Column: add missing check for parent Table in _onLabelPropertyChange
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: Fix title / text alignment of inverted status
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: align test page example
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fiori20Adapter: Strengthened the check for the navigation back button
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Dragging is no longer interrupted by selection at the same time
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Dialog: Custom footer can be reached with Shift+Tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the event parameters for the status and readystate document types in the Uploadcompleted event of Uploadset control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fixed accessing inner controls with tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: Last and Next options title is now correctly retrieved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Arrow navigation issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: close the popover if the opener is not visible
    • Type: FIX, Description: GenericTile overlap happening when sap.m.TileSizeBehavior.Small is used.
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RatingIndicator: Icons visual issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: update appointment styling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: improve screen reader announcements
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: fixed ushell styles for Horizon theme
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Provide base variables as custom CSS properties
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make sap/ui/test/nextUIUpdate publically available
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.LocaleData#requestInstance: Enable synchronous instance creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Element: avoid 'focusfail' when the control still has focus
    • Type: FIX, Description: BindingInfo: Ensure that named models are only parsed once
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/dom/findTabbable: replace recursion with iteration
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControllerExtension support for TypeScript
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: close the popover if the opener is not visible
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Remove deprecated sap.f.IllustratedMessage
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demokit: Replace deprecated sap.m.MessagePage
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Entity updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: Demo Kit: Correct anchor link target in API reference
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Avoid more than one WebPage card load timeout
    • Type: FIX, Description: Calendar controls: fixed visual glitches
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.Splitter: getFocusDomRef now returns correct DOM element
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.VerticalLayout: update documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: SimpleFormDesigntime: hide propery change on inner Form
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: on typeahead no information about result announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Table: Announce required state of columns with 'custom' label controls
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: add menu item selection functionality
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu, sap.ui.unified.Menu: added defaultClass to the items aggregation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fix SR announcements when appointments are selected with keyboard.
    • Type: FIX, Description: Calendar controls: fixed visual glitches
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarRow: Appointments ARIA texts are correctly translated and localized now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Menu: Image icon has correct size now
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: lazy loading with correct scroll pos

item.title: Version 1.71.64 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.64

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Setting labelledBy is correct now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: There is no error when destroying and adding radio buttons on select
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Popup: always assign the content with a valid UIArea

item.title: Version 1.71.66 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.66

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Value is not cleared on invalidation when type password is used
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat.qunit: Fix flaky tests

item.title: Version 1.71.67 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.71.67

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: fix cursor position when there is mask and no entry
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Stop initial re-rendering the input field when type password and clear icon are set
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONModel#loadData: Don't use JSONP
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/.library: Remove wrong component for sap/ui/core/util/MockServer
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: Header buttons are displayed correctly in two months view

item.description:
